text: right Anders Edvard Ramsay (March 23, 1799 in Kuopio - May 12, 1877 in Helsinki) was a Finnish civil servant serving in the Russian Imperial Army, and served as the General of the Finnish Guards' Rifle Battalion from 1829 to 1838. ==See also== * Ramsay (Russian nobility) ==References== Category:Finnish generals Category:1799 births Category:1877 deaths Category:People from Kuopio Category:19th-century Russian military personnel Category:Imperial Russian Army generals Category:Finnish people of Scottish descent
title: Anders Edvard Ramsay
